data.text: @Stupotsy @scottygb "Islamic commies" hmmm you really dont have a clue do you? are you a child? is it past your beddy-byes time? are you getting over-tired? a bit grumpy... well, nighty night

@Stupotsy @scottygb it baffles me why people call him by his *working class style* pretend name instead of his real double-barrel name of Stephen Yaxley-Lennon. Is it because people can then look up his convictions for assaulting police officers, domestic violence, mortgage fraud etc? who's rancid?

@Stupotsy @scottygb because you were shoe-horning it into a debate about an memorial to people killed in Manchester and if you cannot understand that then you are just the type to excuse stephen yaxley lennon breaking British law whilst insisting Muslims strictly obey every nuance. so.... a moron
@Stupotsy @scottygb yep you win "shoe-horn of the week " award for that pro trump shit fountain on a thread about whether a memorial to the dead can be described as a party. FFS
